title: Azamara announces new agent incentive
text:
Save 
Azamara Club Cruises is offering a double upgrade offer with a special new incentive for trade partners registered to its loyalty scheme, Club Royal. 
Agents who make the most bookings on 2016 or 2017 voyages between July 1 and August 31 will win one of 15 places on an exclusive murder mystery experience onboard the Belmond British Pullman. 
It will be the line’s first Club Royal event. The best performing agents will be announced on September 14. 
It comes after Azamara announced its partnership with Royal Caribbean International’s loyalty scheme, Club Royal, in April 2015. 
For every Azamara booking made, agents receive a £10 credit loaded onto a prepaid Mastercard for immediate use on almost any products.
